attributes.additional_details: Stopping littering on the bus by having bins on the bus makes London cleaner.
attributes.background: Ever need to eat on the bus and notice that there isn't a place to dispose the waste? Every time I sit on the bus I notice a lot of litter around the bus, but can we blame them if there aren't any bins on the bus? This just leads to people leaving their rubbish behind.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. TfL is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
